divs: sighting detailssighting report: this took place on march 10 1990 on a clear ski night at 11 pm in gyumri, armenia. the object appeared to be about 200-300 yards high and its size was greater than the wingspan of 2 airbus planes. the object was metallic\dark and shaped like 2 saucers on top of each other. the top part was a little more dome chaped and bottom more flat-like. its shape, although it was visible even without the lights (moon-light), was "outlined" by lights and there were additional lights on the bottom half of the disc that were multicolored (projector-like). it had not cast a single light in the direction of the land when i had seen it. it was a cold night winter was just starting to end with snow and frost everywhere still. this had happened only about a year and change after the devastating earthquake in armenia, and i had heard from otherw who had said they d seen ufo s in that area on different days. another day (summer of that same year) people had reported seeing a ufo that had hovered in the midst of the day in the air for a long time (20-30 minutes) the presence on the ufo that i had seen was very impressive and its unmistakably un-earthly, non-human make was eminent. after i had noticed it, it hovered in the air for perhaps 30 seconds then took off in one direction and up, stopped for a second and took off high into the air and became smaller than a star in seconds and disappeared. if you have questions please do not hesitate to contact me
trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Glendale
There were no other sightings in Glendale on or around June 20th 2005
Summary: Dark Metallic Saucer over Gyumri, Armenia
